item.title: [PI] Project Fatality Full Summoning [PI]
item.dc:creator: @oldskoolpk oldskoolpk
item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Disclaimer: This is not my work, It was coded and released by: arrowzftw from R-S. I am simply just releasing this here, because some of you people might want to take a look at this.[/size][/center]

JUST TO MAKE IT CLEAR USE ANY CLIENT WITH 634 ITEMS AND 602 NPCS.
Lunar is fully working, deadlock is fixed random dcing is fixed too.

MY RS INTERFACE: [Java] RSinterface.java - Pastebin.com

People might need to take some interfaces. Also my cache
www.nzhgamers.com/projectfatalityv6.rar to take the sprites.

SOURCE: UppIT - Free File Sharing - Project Fatality.rar
Thanks to VelSion for removing mySQL

CLIENT: UppIT - Free File Sharing - Client.rar HYBRID PVP CLIENT v3 its not the actual client its just that i dont want to release the client. So i put this here.

Credits: Dagenham, me(arrowzftw), ricky











[SPOILER=“Fixes”]SideBar Fix for other clients:

Find this in client.java in server source:

getActionSender().setChatOptions(0, 0, 0); // reset private messaging options

Under it youll see somthing like this:

	[CODE]setSidebarInterface(1, ####);
		setSidebarInterface(2, ####);
		setSidebarInterface(3, ####);
		setSidebarInterface(4, ####);
		setSidebarInterface(5, ####);
		if(playerMagicBook == 0) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, ####); //modern
		} else {
			setSidebarInterface(6, ####); // ancient
		}
		setSidebarInterface(7, -1);		
		setSidebarInterface(8, ####);
		setSidebarInterface(9, ####);
		setSidebarInterface(10, ####);
		//setSidebarInterface(11, ####); // wrench tab
		setSidebarInterface(11, ####); // wrench tab
		setSidebarInterface(12, ####); // run tab
		setSidebarInterface(13, -1);
		setSidebarInterface(0, ####);[/CODE]

Replace it with this:

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); if(playerMagicBook == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient } setSidebarInterface(7, -1); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); //setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(11, 904); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab setSidebarInterface(13, -1); setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);[/SPOILER]

Read full topic
